borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <div><p style="">The bulk, mass, scale, siting and design of the proposed development would result in a detrimental loss of outlook, and a very overbearing impact to both adjoining neighbours (nos 4 and 6 Ventnor Gardens) and further harm to no.4 Ventnor Gardens as it would cause overshadowing and a loss of daylight into habitable rooms and the garden. The development is therefore considered to be unneighbourly and contrary to: </p><ul><li style="">Paragraph 130(f) of the National Planning Policy Framework &nbsp;(NPPF) (DLUHC, September 2023) </li><li style="">Policy D6 of the London Plan (March 2021); </li><li style="">Policy CP3 of Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010) </li><li style="">Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011) </li><li style="">Paragraph 5.3.3 of the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012) </li><li style="">Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li></ul></div><div><p><o:p></o:p></p></div>

<div><p style="">The bulk, mass, scale and siting&nbsp; of the proposed first floor rear extension would be disproportionately large dominating the rear elevation of the dwelling. The proposal further fails to respect and&nbsp;reflect the design of the main dwellinghouse, especially in terms of roof treatment in congruous with the character of the dwelling. The&nbsp; development is therefore considered harmful to the appearance of the dwelling, built form of the terrace and character of the area. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<br></p><ul><li>Paragraphs 126 and 130 National Planning Policy Framework&nbsp;&nbsp;(NPPF) (DLUHC, September 2023)</li><li>Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021)</li><li>Policy CP3 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)</li><li>Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)</li><li>Paragraph 5.3.3 of the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</li><li>Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan 2037 (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li></ul></div><div><p><o:p></o:p></p></div>
description: Construction of a first floor rear extension
